docs.snippet: The surf, the sun and endless views of island paradise can make the SBS Tournament of Champions feel like a working vacation. Ryan Moore and Justin Thomas were among those putting the emphasis on work at Kapalua....
docs.lead_paragraph: The surf, the sun and endless views of island paradise can make the SBS Tournament of Champions feel like a working vacation. Ryan Moore and Justin Thomas were among those putting the emphasis on work at Kapalua.

headline.main: Moore, Thomas Share Lead at Kapalua

docs.snippet: Dan and Janice Kovacs and their two children were passing through airport security when the gunfire erupted. They were shoeless — with wallets, passports and carry-on items chugging along a conveyer belt — when they sprang into the mas...
docs.lead_paragraph: Dan and Janice Kovacs and their two children were passing through airport security when the gunfire erupted. They were shoeless — with wallets, passports and carry-on items chugging along a conveyer belt — when they sprang into the mass of people running to safety.

headline.main: IDs, Phones, Bags Among 25K Items Lost in Airport Rampage
headline.print_headline: IDs, Phones, Bags Among 25K Items Lost in Airport Rampage

docs.snippet: A witness fearing retribution in the murder trial of wealthy real estate scion Robert Durst, whose ties to several slayings were chronicled in HBO's documentary "The Jinx," will be allowed to testify without revealing his or her identity, a Los An...
docs.lead_paragraph: A witness fearing retribution in the murder trial of wealthy real estate scion Robert Durst, whose ties to several slayings were chronicled in HBO's documentary "The Jinx," will be allowed to testify without revealing his or her identity, a Los Angeles judge  ruled on Friday.

headline.main: Witness May Testify Incognito in Robert Durst of 'The Jinx' Murder Trial
headline.print_headline: Witness May Testify Incognito in Robert Durst of 'The Jinx' Murder Trial

docs.snippet: A transgender California prison inmate who was born male but identifies as female underwent gender-reassignment surgery paid for by the state this week in what is believed to be the first such case in the United States, her attorneys said Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A transgender California prison inmate who was born male but identifies as female underwent gender-reassignment surgery paid for by the state this week in what is believed to be the first such case in the United States, her attorneys said Friday.

headline.main: California Pays for Inmate's Gender Reassignment Surgery
headline.print_headline: California Pays for Inmate's Gender Reassignment Surgery
